name: Mad Driver (itch) (Powerseeker)
description:
I Remade a game I made a while ago in pocket code with Unreal Engine 5.

I made the UI and programming

The models and textures are from Unreal Marketplace and Quixel megascans

THE MUSIC IS NOT MINE

It's from Freddy Fazbear’s Pizzeria Simulator, I used it because I really like it.

Thats why I'm not taking donations, and it might get replaced in the future

In the future I will be focusing on making horror games.

This is my first finished game.

Biological experiment

You can find a short version of my dream game made on roblox :

https://www.roblox.com/games/4825855385/Biological-experiment

This is my dream project that will consist of about 12 games

The roblox version was created because I didn't have a good pc, and the story got completely changed.
